mapper.select: SELECT seq, memId, content, bbsSeq, created, del FROM ( SELECT row_number() OVER(ORDER BY created DESC) AS rnum, seq, memId, content, bbsSeq, created, del FROM tipcomment WHERE bbsSeq=#{bbsSeq}) a WHERE rnum BETWEEN ${pageStart} AND ${pageEnd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tipcomment (seq, memId, content, bbsSeq, created, del) VALUES (tipcomment_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{content}, #{bbsSeq}, sysdate, 0)
